com.team.shared.engine.data.stock.database

Class StockDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team.shared.engine.data.stock.database.StockDataBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class StockDataBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    This class manages all the Order(s) and Transaction(s) of a specific Stock.

    There are 3 main Collections:

    • awaitingBuyOrders.
    • awaitingSellOrders.
    • successfullyFinishedTransactions.

    Constructor:

    initializes all fields.

    Note:

    • Must initialize the fields with their Constructors.
    • SortableLinkedList Overrides each toString().

    Version:
    2.0
    See Also:
    AddTabsCollection, Serialized Form
